channel.title: bit manipulation on Davidul
channel.description: Recent content in bit manipulation on Davidul

item.title: Bit Manipulation
item.description: Bit manipulation Bitwise logical operators Bitwise AND (&) Compares every bit of two numbers and applies AND operation to each of them. For example 5 (101b) and 3 (011b) will give 1. 5 & 3 -> 1 101 011 --- 001 6 & 5 -> 4 110 101 --- 100 Bitwise OR (|) Compares every bit of two numbers and applies OR operation to each of them.
